text.name: label
text.description: Menu's label (default: empty, but required for menus other than popup menus).

text.name: help
text.description: Help shown in statusbar when the menu is selected (only for submenus of another wxMenu, default: none).

bool.name: enabled
bool.description: Is the submenu item enabled (only for submenus of another wxMenu, default: 1)?
